message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can find a price closer to its true worth. I would like to propose a price of $8200.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I still believe the product is worth more than $8200. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $8500.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to get a good deal, but I still believe the product is worth more than $8500. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $9800.
I understand your position, Alice. Given the current market value and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final offer of $9000.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go below $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9500.
Considering the ongoing negotiations and our previous discussions, I would like to make a final offer of $9200.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your determination, but I'm still not willing to go below $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10300.
After careful consideration, I would like to make a final offer of $9700 for the product.
